creator: ekpn@ambrac.nl
text:
fop 0.20.2RC exits with [error]: null when encountering ' (apos) in a footnote. 
XEP 2.5 and Antenna House 1.1 do not. if ' (apos) is not in body-text there is 
no problem.
example from filexxx.fo:
<fo:list-item-body start-indent="body-start()">
<fo:block space-before="0pt" space-after="1pt" text-align="justify">Dr. iur., 
LL.M. (London), Schil, Den & Dus,
Attorneys, Winterthur, Switzerland. I'm indebted to Richard
Gard, University College , for his advice and to the Swiss National
Foundation for its support.</fo:block>
</fo:list-item-body>

creator: ekpn@ambrac.nl
text:
sorry, i wanted to write: if ' (apos) is in body-text there is 
no problem.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
